staffdatamodel

Class StaffList

  • java.lang.Object
    • observertestharness.IObserverFunctions
      • staffdatamodel.StaffList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class StaffList
extends IObserverFunctions
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holds a collection of staff members. It has an ArrayList of StaffMember objects. The ArrayList has neither a set method nor a get method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaffList()
      Default (empty) constructor creates a new (empty) list of staff.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStaff(StaffMember newStaff)
      Accessor to add the provided StaffMember object to the list of staff members
      java.lang.String[] getAllNames()
      This method creates a string array containing all the names of the current staff members in the format "forename surname"
      StaffMember getStaffAt(int index)
      Accessor to retrieve the StaffMember item specified by the index parameter
      StaffMember removeStaffAt(int index)
      Accessor to remove a staff member from the staff list.

      Retrieves the number of staff members in the list

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaffList

        public StaffList()
        Default (empty) constructor creates a new (empty) list of staff.

    • Method Detail

      • addStaff

        public void addStaff(StaffMember newStaff)
        Accessor to add the provided StaffMember object to the list of staff members
        Parameters:
        newStaff - - The StaffMember object to add to the list.

      • removeStaffAt

        public StaffMember removeStaffAt(int index)
        Accessor to remove a staff member from the staff list. The index parameter identifies the staff member to be removed.
        Parameters:
        index - - A zero based index value specifying the staff member to remove from the list
        Returns:
        The StaffMember object removed from the list OR NULL if the index value was invalid.

      • getAllNames

        public java.lang.String[] getAllNames()
        This method creates a string array containing all the names of the current staff members in the format "forename surname"
        Returns:
        A String array of staff member names.

      • getStaffAt

        public StaffMember getStaffAt(int index)
        Accessor to retrieve the StaffMember item specified by the index parameter
        Parameters:
        index - - A zero based index value specifying the item required from the list
        Returns:
        - The staff member at the specified index or NULL if no staff member can be found.

      • size

        public int size()
        Retrieves the number of staff members in the list
        Returns:
        the size of the list ArrayList (number of staff members)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
